name: Poison Breath
book: Pathfinder Player Companion: Dirty Tactics Toolbox © 2015, Paizo Inc.
text: You expel a cone-shaped burst of toxic mist from your mouth, subjecting everyone caught in the area to a deadly poison, as per the poison spell.
components_zh: 语言，姿势，材料/法器（一只蜘蛛的下颌骨）
text_zh: 你从嘴里喷出一股锥形爆发的毒雾，让被困在区域中的每一个目标都受到致命毒药，就像毒击术（poison）一样。
